title: Public Holidays (Declaration) (No. 2) Notice, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 633
Gazette date 6th August, 2021
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORYINSTRUMENTNO.71of 2021
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws,Volume15,Cap.272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) (No. 2 ) Notice, 2021
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection3of thePublic
HolidaysAct,thefollowingNoticeisissued:
1. (1) This Notice May be Cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration) (No.2)Notice,2021.
2. It is declared that Friday, 13th August, 2021 shall be Declaration
observed asaPublicHoliday followingtheConductofGeneral ofPublic
Holiday
ElectionstobeheldonThursday,12thAugust,2021,aPublicHoliday
EDGARC.LUNGU,
LUSAKA President
6thAugust,2021
[CO.101/9/1]
CopiesofthisStatutory Instrumentcan be obtained from the GovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101 Lusaka.PriceK4.00each.
